code: import produce from'immer';var STATE_INICIAL={token:null,signed:false,user:false,id:null,name:null,loading:false};export default function auth(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:STATE_INICIAL;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'SIGNIN_SUCCESS':return produce(state,function(draft){draft.token=action.payload.token;draft.signed=true;draft.user=action.payload.user.admin;draft.id=action.payload.user.id;draft.name=action.payload.user.name;});case'SIGNIN_FAILURE':return produce(state,function(draft){draft.token=STATE_INICIAL.token;draft.signed=false;draft.user=null;draft.id=null;draft.name=null;});default:return state;}}
